elements.name: Add item to cart and view cart

steps.name: I add the product to cart
the product should be added to cart
I click on cart icon
I should see the cart page
I should see items in cart
I should see cart subtotal

name: Amazon Shopping Cart Functionality
description:
As a user
  I want to manage items in my shopping cart
  So that I can review and purchase selected products

steps.name: I am on Amazon homepage
I should see Amazon homepage loaded successfully
the page title should contain "Amazon"
I should see the search box
I should see the cart icon

name: Amazon Homepage Functionality
description:
As a user
  I want to access Amazon homepage
  So that I can browse and shop for products

steps.name: I am on Amazon homepage
I search for "bluetooth speaker"
I should see search results
I click on the first search result
I should be on the product detail page
I should see the product title
I should see the product price
I should see Add to Cart button
I should see product availability status

name: Amazon Product Detail Page Functionality
description:
As a user
  I want to view product details
  So that I can make informed purchase decisions

steps.name: I am on Amazon homepage
I search for "laptop"
I should see search results
I should see at least 1 search results
search results should contain product titles

name: Amazon Product Search Functionality
description:
As a user
  I want to search for products on Amazon
  So that I can find items I want to purchase

steps.name: I am on Amazon homepage
I should see Amazon homepage loaded successfully
